songs.title: Colors, Pt. 2
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hmm
Everything is—

[Chorus]
Everything is (Blue)
Everything is (Blue)
You're dripping like a saturated sunrise (Sun—, sun—)
Everything is blue (Blue)
I hope you make it to the day you're 28 years old
Everything is blue (Blue)
Everything is (Blue)

[Outro]
Hmm
